hadiths.text: A'isha (Allah be pleased with her) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:There is no day when God sets free more servants from Hell than the Day of 'Arafa. He draws near, then praises them to the angels, saying: What do these want?

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ الْحَجِّ وَالْعُمْرَةِ وَيَوْمِ عَرَفَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of the day of 'Arafat
